name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thurman BONNER, Appellant (two cases)

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thurman BONNER, Appellant (two cases).

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Abraham J. Brem Levy, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Shelley New, Philadelphia, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
372 A.2d 1202
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thurman BONNER, Appellant (two cases).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 14, 1977.
Decided May 17, 1977.
Abraham J. Brem Levy, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Shelley New, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
